description: Packed full of rich festive flavours, this simple almond Christmas cake with vanilla frosting will definitely impress loved ones.
name: Almond Christmas Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cover cake with foil. Invert onto a board and cool completely. Remove cake from pan. Spread with frosting. Top with toasted nuts. Serve.
